summary:
Dota 2 is a popular team-based video game where players battle to destroy the enemy's base. Each player controls a unique hero with special powers. The game is free and has no paid content, but offers optional cosmetic items.

It's known for its competitive esports scene, with big tournaments and prize money. Players from around the world watch and play, filling stadiums and attracting millions online.

Though challenging to learn, Dota 2 is praised for its exciting gameplay and has been called one of the best games ever made.
title: Dota 2
